outputs.output_descr: Support to Monapo: This project aims at informing and supporting national growth and development strategies and to provide a model for sustainable public and private investments leading to an economic transformation in rural areas.

outputs.output_descr: Provide support for decision making and strengthening capacity in the area of Information Communication Technologies in the Ministry of Science and Technology
Support to the establishment of the National Programme for Decentralized Planning and Finance

Gaza project was created upon Province request for support after 3 consecutive years of floods, from 2000 to 2002 that seriously affected the province at all levels. Currently after 5 years of intervention the province has achieved substantive and satisfactory results both in terms of governance and food security. Despite still a separate project it is being implemented as integrated part of the National Programme for Decentralized Planning and Budget approved in late 2010 that addresses a complex set of local governance and development challenges including participation, accountability or LED
donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT

outputs.output_descr: The Local Economic Development Process Support Programme in Moçambique (ART-PAPDEL), is part of the ART Initiative, with focus on complementing current decentralized planning and financial management processes in Mozambique.
